thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Lee
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Lee

author: Lee
title: Lee
text: Ordering an assortment of sweatshirts for my non-profit-- Josh was incredibly helpful in juggling all the requests and questions I had and made this experience way easier than any other site has. Even when I told Josh I wasn't ready to order just yet, he still gave me awesome service and made me feel confident in my decision to use this company.
